content.rendered:
Our triple strength 1500 mg Garlic Oil softgels contain three times as much garlic oil as regular garlic oil softgels.

NOW Garlic Oil delivers the natural nutrient profile found in Genuine Whole Foods.

NOW’s Garlic Oil is extracted and concentrated from the bulb of Allium sativum. It is equivalent to a whole garlic clove with no added fillers. Garlic is rich in sulfur compounds, amino acids and trace minerals.

  • Genuine Whole Food
  • Herbal Supplement
  • Triple Strength
  • GMP Quality Assured
  • A Dietary Supplement
Suggested Use

As a dietary supplement, take 3 softgels daily, preferably with meals. Consider taking this product in combination with NOW Hawthorn Extract, Immune Renew and Chlorophyll.

If you are pregnant/lactating or taking any medications, please consult your healthcare practitioner prior to use. Store in a cool, dry place. Do not eat freshness packet. Keep in bottle.
Positive
  • Quality
  • Really Natural
  • Cheap price
Negatives
  • Contains Soy
  • Strong garlic smell
